msg
The magnificent Sanias Castle lives three sisters——
华丽堂皇的沙尼亚特城堡中居住着这样的三姐妹——
豪華絢爛なシャニアテの城には三人の姉妹が住んでいる。
화려하고 아름다운 샤니아테 성에는 세 자매가 살고 있다.
The magnificent castle of Sarnath was inhabited by such three sisters -
Three sisters live in the luxurious Chaniate castle.
msg
The eldest sister Sessiria is gentle, kind,  and beautiful, always the crown jewel for everyone.
大姐塞西莉亚温柔善良，美丽动人，是大家永远的明珠。
長女のセシリアは優しくて美しい。誰にとっても永遠の宝石のような存在。
장녀 세실리아는 상냥하고 아름답다. 누구에게도 영원한 보석 같은 존재.
The eldest sister Cecilia gentle and kind, beautiful and moving, is the pearl of everyone forever.
Cecilia, our eldest daughter, is kind and beautiful. She is an eternal jewel for everyone.
msg
The younger sister Maria is diligent and hard-working, who never gives up, always chasing the light of pearl, just like the hard diamond.
二姐玛丽亚姐姐刻苦努力，永不放弃，追逐着明珠的光芒，宛如坚韧的钻石。
次女のマリアは努力家で決して諦めない。宝石の輝きを追い求める強靭なダイヤモンドのように。
차녀 마리아는 노력가로 절대 포기하지 않는다. 보석의 빛을 좇는 강인한 다이아몬드처럼.
The second sister Maria sister hard work, never give up, chasing the light of the pearl, like a tough diamond.
Maria, the second daughter, is a hard worker and never gives up. Like a mighty diamond pursuing the brilliance of a gemstone.
msg
The youngest sister Angelia is adorable, smart and educated, but she can only look up to her sister and imagine silently while overshadowed by their honor.
妹妹安洁利亚乖巧可人，知书达理，但却只能仰望着姐姐们的光芒，遮蔽在璀璨的荣光下默默地憧憬。
三女のアンジェリアはおとなしく、知性に富んでいる。しかし、姉たちの輝きを目にしながらも、陰で密かに憧れているだけだった。
삼녀 안젤리아는 얌전하고 지혜롭다. 하지만 언니들의 빛을 보면서도, 그림자 속에서 몰래 동경할 뿐이었다.
The younger sister, Angelia, is well-behaved and sensible, but can only look up to the light of her sisters, sheltered in the radiant glory of silent longing.
Angelia, the third daughter, is quiet and intelligent. However, while she sees the brilliance of her older sisters, she only secretly admires them behind their backs.
msg
When the clan chiefs bring the bright pearls and send the two older sisters to the ball named "Maiden", only the youngest sister is excluded.
当家族的元老们捧着耀眼的明珠，将姐姐们送到名为“圣女”的舞会时，只有妹妹被拒之门外。
一族の元老たちが輝かしい宝石を持って、姉たちを「聖女」という名の舞踏会に送り出した時、三女だけは外されてしまった。
일족의 원로들이 빛나는 보석을 들고, 언니들을 「성녀」라는 이름의 무도회로 보냈을 때, 삼녀만은 제외되고 말았다.
When the patriarchs of the family held the dazzling pearls and sent the sisters to the ball called the "Holy Maiden", only the sister was turned away.
When the clan elders sent the sisters off to a ball named "Saint" with their illustrious jewels, only the three girls were left out.
msg
Becase she does not have the cyrstal shoes to step on to the stage…she is born to be ordinary and not qualified to wear the cyrstal shoes.
因为她没有踏上舞台的水晶鞋的…是天生便没有资格穿上那双水晶鞋的普通人。
なぜなら彼女にはガラスの靴がなかったからだ。生まれてからそのガラスの靴を履く資格を持たない普通の人間だったのだ。
왜냐하면 그녀에겐 유리 구두가 없었기 때문이다. 태어날 때부터 그 유리 구두를 신을 자격이 없는 평범한 인간이었던 것이다.
Because she did not step on the crystal shoes of the stage ... is born is not qualified to wear the crystal shoes of ordinary people.
Because she had no glass slipper. She was an ordinary person who was not qualified to wear those glass slipper since she was born.
msg
Therefore, Angelia start to spend efforts to dress herself up, wearing the beautiful gowns and shining crowns, walking elegantly like a princess, just to get closer to her sisters.
于是，安洁利亚开始努力打扮自己。穿上华美的礼服，戴上璀璨的头冠，像公主一样优雅地走路，只为更接近姐姐们一些。
そこで、アンジェリアは頑張って化粧をした。綺麗なドレスに身を包み、キラキラしたティアラをかぶり、お姫様のように振る舞い優雅に歩いた。姉たちに少しでも近づくために。
그래서 안젤리아는 화장을 열심히 했다. 아름다운 드레스를 입고 반짝이는 티아라를 쓰고 공주처럼 행동하며 우아하게 걸었다. 언니들에게 조금이라도 가까워지기 위해.
So, Angelia started to dress herself hard. Putting on a gorgeous gown, wearing a radiant tiara, walking gracefully like a princess, just to be a little closer to her sisters.
So Angelia did her best to put on makeup. Dressed in a beautiful dress, wearing a sparkling tiara, she acted like a princess and walked gracefully. To be as close to her sisters as possible.
msg

But…all efforts cannot change the fact that she is ordinary. The youngest sister start to realize the brutal truth. The clan she belongs to only emphasize the special ability. No matter how hard she try, she is just a well groomed Cinderella.
但是…普通人就是普通人，妹妹意识到了现实是如此残酷。她所在的家族，只看重那份特别的能力，无论她再怎么努力到最后也不过是一个穿着光鲜的灰姑娘罢了。
しかし、所詮は普通の人間だった。現実は残酷であると気づいたのだ。シャニアテ家は特殊な能力しか重視しない。どれだけ頑張っても結局は輝きを纏ったお姫様にしかなれないのだ。
하지만 결국 그녀는 평범한 인간이었다. 현실이残酷하다는 걸 깨달은 것이다. 샤니아테 가문은 특별한 능력만을 중시했다. 아무리 노력해도 결국 빛을 둘러싼 공주에 불과할 뿐이었다.

But... ordinary people are ordinary people, and my sister realized that reality is so cruel. Her family, only valued that special ability, no matter how hard she worked in the end is just a scantily clad Cinderella.

But I was just an ordinary person. He realized that reality is cruel. The Shaniate family only values special abilities. No matter how hard you try, in the end you can only become a princess in all her glory.

しかし、彼女がどれだけ祈ろうと夢にまで見たガラスの靴は現れなかった……所詮、童話は童話なのだ。現実には起こりえない。
하지만 그녀가 아무리 기도해도 꿈에서까지 그리던 유리구두는 나타나지 않았다... 결국 동화는 동화일 뿐. 현실에선 일어날 수 없는 일이었다.
No matter how she prayed, the crystal shoes she dreamed of still did not appear... Fairy tales are fairy tales and cannot come true.

And so, the youngest sister grows up with the identity of an ordinary people, and starts a different journey as her sisters, without any intersection.

이렇게 안젤리아는 평범한 인간으로 성장해 갔다. 언니들과는 전혀 다른 길을 걸으며... 그리고 다시 만나는 일은 없었다.
In this way, the sister grew up as an ordinary person and began to take a very different path from her sisters, and never crossed paths again.
